file_content.text: Let me see if I understand. You walked--walked--from the Migrant Merchants' Guild, to bring a complaint about... your market stall?
Thought I'd better come in person, see. This thing I read on the HoloNet says anyone can talk to their Senator.
Well, Senator Vericks has a full calendar today. But I can get you ten minutes between his finance subcommittee hearing and a working lunch.
Wow. He must be a right busy fellow.
True, but he'd never forgive me if he missed this.
